document_data.name: Shadow Gauntlet
document_data.mainbody: '''''Shadow gauntlet''''' was a [[spell]] crafted by the [[wizard]] [[Jume]] that acted as an enhanced version of ''[[shadow hand]]''.
document_data.Effects: This spell created a hand made of shadows that could manipulate objects, shield the caster, or wield weapons. It could be commanded by the caster, without concentration, to travel, strike opponents, or raise weapons against them. It could be attacked and destroyed by magical or non-magical means.
